item.title: How to setup Remark42 for Hugo blog?
item.description: How to Install and Configure Remark42 on Oracle Cloud Using Docker + Nginx If you have a Hugo blog and want to add comments, Remark42 is one of the best choices, because is free, different from Disqus that you need to pay, but the thing that makes Remark42 not so simple, is that it is self-hosted, so I created this guide to help you, telling how I did it, so don’t have to go to the same trouble I had.
